country.name: KENYA
country.tagline: Explore the heart of East Africa with stunning safaris and breathtaking landscapes

whyGo.title: WHY GO ON A KENYAN SAFARI ADVENTURE
points: Experience the famous Maasai Mara National Reserve
Explore Amboseli National Park with stunning views of Mount Kilimanjaro
Visit the stunning Lake Nakuru for a glimpse of flamingos
Choose from flexible dates and customizable packages

highlights: Experience the breathtaking landscapes of the Maasai Mara, home to the Great Migration
Explore the stunning views of Mount Kenya, Africa’s second-highest peak
Witness the incredible wildlife at Amboseli National Park with Kilimanjaro in the background
Relax on the pristine white sand beaches of Diani and the Kenyan coast
Discover the flamingo-filled Lake Nakuru and its famous rhino sanctuary
Visit the vibrant capital, Nairobi, and experience its rich culture and history
Enjoy a boat safari on Lake Naivasha and spot hippos and exotic birdlife
Explore the unique landscapes of Hell’s Gate National Park, inspiration for The Lion King
Visit the historic town of Lamu, a UNESCO World Heritage Site
Experience the vast, untouched wilderness of Tsavo National Park

tours.title: MAASAI MARA & AMBOSELI EXPLORER
tours.currencyInfo: The amount will be charged in KES

details.tagline: THE GREAT MIGRATION & BIG FIVE EXPERIENCE
details.description: Join an expert local guide and a small group of like-minded travellers on a classic Kenyan trip across the country. One of our 7-day Kenya tours, this journey has a focus on nature while also offering unique insights into the culture of this diverse and vibrant nation.
details.privateTourInfo: To enjoy a more personal experience with your own guide, check out the private version of this tour.
highlights: Witness the breathtaking Great Migration in the Maasai Mara
Explore the stunning Great Rift Valley and its beautiful lakes
Relax on the pristine beaches of Diani and explore the historic streets of Lamu

itinerary.title: Arrival in Nairobi
itinerary.description: Explore the vibrant city, visit the Nairobi National Museum and the Giraffe Centre.

itinerary.title: Maasai Mara Safari
itinerary.description: Drive to the Maasai Mara National Reserve and enjoy an afternoon game drive.

itinerary.title: Full-Day Safari in Maasai Mara
itinerary.description: Experience a full-day game drive, witnessing the Big Five and the Great Migration (seasonal).
